Package client.game

Class PlayerInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.game.PlayerInfo
  • public class PlayerInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores and provides local information of a player.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerInfo

        public PlayerInfo​(java.lang.String name,
                  int x,
                  int y)
        Creates an instance of PlayerInfo with a player name and sets the initial speed and position.

        Also initializes object fields necessary for the game logic and mechanics.

        Parameters:
        name - specifies the value of the field that holds the name of the player.
        x - specifies the initial x position.
        y - specifies the initial y position.

    • Method Detail

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer​(int x,
                       int y)
        Updates the position of a player and previous/next vector.
        Parameters:
        x - specifies the horizontal coordinate of the new tile in relation to the upper left corner (increases rightward).
        y - specifies the horizontal coordinate of the new tile in relation to the upper left corner (increases downward).

      • checkMoves

        public void checkMoves()
        Examines movement.

      • setCurrentLocation

        public void setCurrentLocation​(int x,
                               int y)
        Updates the position of a player without altering vectors.
        Parameters:
        x - specifies the horizontal coordinate of the new tile in relation to the upper left corner (increases rightward).
        y - specifies the horizontal coordinate of the new tile in relation to the upper left corner (increases downward).

      • setCurrentLocation

        public void setCurrentLocation​(Location loc)
        Updates the position of a player without altering vectors.
        Parameters:
        loc - specifies the positionX-positionY coordinate of the new tile in relation to the upper left corner (positionX increases rightward and positionY downward).

      • getNextVectorArrivalPoint

        public Location getNextVectorArrivalPoint()
        Getter for the x-y coordinate of the end of the vector that is added to the current position.
        Returns:
        x-y coordinate of the next vectors arrival point.

      • getCurrentLocation

        public Location getCurrentLocation()
        Getter for the positionX-positionY coordinate of the players position.
        Returns:
        x-y coordinate of the next vectors arrival point.
